name: react-tooltip

scripts.devcss: node-sass example/src/index.scss example/dist/index.css & node-sass -w example/src/index.scss example/dist/index.css
scripts.dev: mkdir -p ./example/dist & npm run devjs & npm run devcss & http-server example -p 8888 -s -o
scripts.deployjs: babel src/index.js --out-file dist/react-tooltip.js && babel src/style.js --out-file dist/style.js
scripts.deploy: mkdir dist & npm run deployjs & npm run deploycss
